able to be folded: This useful foldable bike fits in the boot of your car.
More examplesFewer examplesMicro-scooters are lightweight, foldable aluminium versions of the classic children's scooter. The unique design of this foldable resin highchair means that you can set it at seven different height positions.Experiments with foldable parachutes continued, and in 1887 Captain Thomas Baldwin introduced a silk parachute with vent opening in the USA. The company has confirmed it is working on foldable phones.
